title: Puterjs - Free, Serverless, Cloud and AI
content: Puter.js is a frontend-only JavaScript SDK that lets you ship full-stack apps without stitching together five different services. It provides auth, cloud storage, databse, GPT-4o, o1, o30min, Claude, DALL-E & more through a single JS library. Checkout: https://developer.puter.com/ Github: https://github.com/heyPuter/puter/ Tutorials: https://developer.puter.com/tutorials/

title: ã€ç½‘ç«™è‡ªå»ºã€‘: Seedance 2.0: AI Dance Video Generator Online ( https://seedance2video.com )
content:
Seedance 2.0: AI Dance Video Generator Online | Free AI Dance Animation Maker
website: https://seedance2video.com/
AI-powered dance video generation tool powered by Seedance 2.0, making professional dance video creation fast, simple and accessible to everyone.
Short Introduction
Seedance2Video is an AI dance video generator that creates smooth, professional dance videos with one click. No filming, choreography or editing skills needed. Generate high-quality videos in seconds, new users can try for free.
Detailed Introduction
Seedance2Video powered by Seedance 2.0 brings professional AI dance video generation to everyone.
No more complicated choreography, camera shooting or post-production. Just enter your ideas, and the AI automatically generates smooth character dance movements and complete video clips in 10â€“20 seconds.
The video output features natural motion, coherent rhythm and high-definition clarity, with all details preserved like a professional shoot. Supports high-res, watermark-free video export for all creative needs.
Free usage is available for new users with no payment required.
Core Features
Powered by Seedance 2.0 AI model for smoother, more realistic dance motion
One-click AI generation, no choreography, filming or editing required
10â€“20 seconds fast generation with real-time preview
Natural, fluent character movements and professional video quality
Cross-platform compatible, works on mobile and desktop
High-resolution, watermark-free video export
Usage Scenarios
Social media short video creation
Creative AI animation & visual content
Dance choreography design & preview
Personal custom entertainment videos
Online creative digital content production
